localize.text: Oh, I was recalling your footsteps.
While there were clichés, you sometimes made the results more exciting by acting in an unexpected way.
Still, the endings were all the same, no matter how the process went.
Do you want me to share the memories through a hologram?
That was you in a mess when there wasn't a cognition filter.
I didn’t know that a human’s mental capacity could be so weak. You did alright the first couple of times, but then, one day...
Well, at that time, it was a little funny. I'm sorry. You came all this way, but you weren't able to escape from your guilt and hung yourself. Well, you were stopped immediately.
Then, at this time, you were not fully ready.
After that, I slowly realized that it didn't matter if you were mentally whole or not. What mattered was that you needed to find ‘enlightenment’ about something to stop this endless cycle.
Oh, at this time, all of a sudden you began apologizing to me. This was... I didn't enjoy it.
Are you starting to enjoy this?
I would love to see more, but let’s stop here for today.
You might see something that you're not supposed see yet.
Please understand, I don’t have much entertainment that I can enjoy.
Really, you should've left me some form of entertainment.
